text: Stephannie Blanco Salazar (born 13 December 2000) is a Costa Rican footballer who plays as a defender for Spanish Primera División club Deportivo La Coruña and the Costa Rica women's national team. ==Club career== In January 2020 Stephannie joined Liga Deportiva Alajuelense. ==International goals== Scores and results list Costa Rica's goal tally first {| class="wikitable" |- ! No. !! Date !! Venue !! Opponent !! Score !! Result !! Competition |- | 1 || 28 July 2019 || Estadio Universidad San Marcos, Lima, Peru || || 2–1 || 3–1 || 2019 Pan American Games |} ==Personal life== Blanco is a Bribri from Talamanca. ==References== Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football defenders Category:Costa Rican women's footballers Category:People from Limón Province Category:Indigenous peoples in Costa Rica Category:Costa Rica women's international footballers Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Costa Rica Category:Pan American Games medalists in football Category:Footballers at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:Deportivo de La Coruña (women) players Category:Costa Rican expatriate sportspeople in Spain Category:Expatriate women's footballers in Spain
title: Stephannie Blanco
